title: Limited availability on 2 Beds in this price range
posting_body: Located in a vibrant live-work-play area brings you close to everything that makes living in Austin so exciting.
Conveniently situated in the East Riverside neighborhood, it's just across the river from Downtown Austin.
One of the area’s most desirable neighborhoods.
Easy access to I-35, East Riverside Drive, and Pleasant Valley Road.
Major employers like AMD, Dell, Apple, and Charles Schwab are only a 5-to-20-minute car ride away.
Urban conveniences like dining, shopping, hiking, and nightlife are all nearby.
Just minutes away enjoy popular outlets like The Capital Grille, Garrison, Csilla Somogyi, and 2nd Street District.
Explore the Texas Capitol, Circe Acres Nature Preserve, or Secret Beach.
Tee up at Roy G Guerrero Disc Golf Course, visit the Colorado River Park Wildlife Sanctuary, or spend the day at Delwood Shopping Center.
All of this and more is less than  15minutes away.
You're going to get such a kick out of living here!
Christena Barry - Award Winning Locator & Realtor
*Pics show general property, not necessarily particular unit.
